wikipedia_page.main: Matthew (Matt) Edwards (born 4 June 1975) is an English electronic music producer and DJ based in Berlin, Germany. He is best known for his work in house and techno that he produces under his Radio Slave moniker. He has also released under a variety of different aliases including Cabin Fever, Canvas, DJ Maxxi, The Machine, REKID, Seadevils and Quiet Village. He is also co-founder of London-based record label Rekids, which he formed in 2006 with James Masters. Rekids is also mother label to the REK'D and Pyramids of Mars imprints.

response: Matt Edwards was the winner of the 2005 Jack Kaiser Award. Edwards was a senior first baseman for the Notre Dame Fighting Irish.
* Matt Edwards (footballer) (born 1971), English football player (Reading, Brighton & Hove Albion)
* Matt Edwards (artist) (born 1982), English comedian, magician, and actor
* Matt Edwards (pool player) (born 1987), New Zealand pool player
